snippet: In the wake of the massacre in Newtown, Conn., Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo of New York plans to propose one of the country’s most restrictive bans on assault weapons.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo, in wake of massacre in Newtown, Conn, plans to propose one of the country’s most restrictive bans on assault weapons; he wants to broaden number of guns and magazines covered by existing law while also making it harder for gun makers to tweak their firearms to get around the ban.
lead_paragraph: In the wake of the massacre in Newtown, Conn., Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo of New York plans to propose one of the country’s most restrictive bans on assault weapons.

headline.seo: Cuomo to Propose Broader Ban on Assault Weapons
headline.main: Cuomo to Press for Wider Curbs on Gun Access
headline.print_headline: Cuomo to Press For Wider Curbs Over Gun Access
